Name: Jarvis
Fate: Sunk by Japanese aircraft off Guadalcanal 9 August 1942.
Draft:
12 ft 10 in (3.9 m) full,
10 ft 4 in (3.1 m) light
Range: 6,500 nmi (12,038 km) at 12 knots (22.2 km/h; 13.8 mph)
Armament:
4 × 5"/38 caliber guns (12 cm),
4 × .50 cal (12.7 mm) guns,
12 × 21 in (533 mm)  torpedo tubes,
2 × depth charge tracks
